alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 10:44AM CDT until further notice by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri and Kansas... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. Little Osage River at Fulton affecting Bourbon County. Marmaton River near Nevada affecting Vernon County. Osage River near Schell City affecting Vernon and Bates Counties. Osage River at Taberville affecting St. Clair County. .Heavy rainfall that occurred over the Marmaton and Osage River Basins on Wednesday has caused the river to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Osage River at Taberville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.3 feet, The handicapped access to the Osage River launch area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.4 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1045 AM CDT.
